name: Elysium (Aidan Sanjay, UOWM Game Development, JujuannaIguana, Nessa Ong, darrenchong, Chris LY, JellyFeng, Chong Chun Zeng)
name_original: Elysium (Aidan Sanjay, UOWM Game Development, JujuannaIguana, Nessa Ong, darrenchong, Chris LY, JellyFeng, Chong Chun Zeng)
description:
ENTER ELYSIUM 

"If you have faith, you will be granted strength."

Elysium, set in ancient Greece; a place where the Greek Faith is at it's peak.  Protected and governed by 8 individuals who are regarded as the Pillars of Elysium, they have been granted Godly powers from their respective Gods in exchange for their unyielding faith. The Greek Gods gain power as more people have faith in them & worship them. 

You take on the Artorius, a weak individual who is frustrated at himself for being weak and a coward in battle. He travels to Elysium to seek strength from the God of War, Ares and his Pillar that represents him on Elysium. Elysium has a rule where those that arrive here on a pilgrimage may not stay for long, but Artorius was determined to meet the Pillar of Ares; so he stayed back and was involved in an event not even the Gods could have predicted. The faith of Elysium has been corrupted, the Gods have now lost connection to Elysium. 

Artorius now has to combat his way to each Pillar cleansing them from their corruption (also taking their powers for himself) and restoring Elysium back to it's glory and along the way becoming Elysium's greatest hero.
